text: The Allegheny Mountain Collegiate Conference Men's Basketball Tournament is the annual conference basketball championship tournament for the NCAA Division III Allegheny Mountain Collegiate Conference. The tournament has been held annually since the AMCC was founded in 1998. It is a single-elimination tournament and seeding is based on regular season records. The winner, declared conference champion, receives the AMCC's automatic bid to the NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Championship.
